fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Fusaka mainnet proposed: Dec 3rd fork, Nov 3rd releases
Sepolia BPO1 scheduled for next week (Oct 22nd)
Holesky BPO2 and Sepolia fork completed successfully

client_updates.highlight: Teku bug: only subscribed to 8 subnets instead of all when not flagged as supernode

critical_infrastructure.highlight: Blob API changes caught L2s off-guard; proof format changed from 4844 to PeerDAS style
Blob retrieval concern: L2s need light supernode mode to avoid full bandwidth requirements

testing_progress.highlight: DevNet-3 stable; no major client issues discovered in Fusaka contest

organizational.highlight: Decision: Keep trustless payments in ePBS; move forward with current spec
EIP-7688 (generalized indices) PFI'd; inclusion discussion deferred until Fusaka ships

action_items.action: Finalize Fusaka mainnet dates at next week's ACD call
Implement light supernode mode for blob retrieval

decisions.decision: Trustless payments remain in ePBS EIP-7732; no separation into standalone EIP
Target Fusaka mainnet releases by Nov 3rd for Dec 3rd fork (pending final confirmation)
